channel.title: ¥¯°·.¸.¸.·°¯¥ LiveScape Server Development Team - NEED MORE PEOPLE ¥¯°·.¸.¸.·°¯¥
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=Navy]LiveScape Server Development Team[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE] [B][SIZE=4]By Java_Coffee™[/SIZE][/B][/CENTER]
'Ello! I've building/running my old LiveScape, I've tired to code server, and answering/handling newbies in the server - And I need some help, I decide to create the development team for LiveScape Server. I'll be gladly if I hear you join the server development team!
I don't have a server (I had lost the server after whole system restore from my computer) we will start work from the beginning. And I just thought that if we can have our own LiveScape Server's client, why bother do this? We can make the server for moparscape/silabsoft client. Tell me if you really think if we should have our own client.
I have my own forum (IPB), I'll release the forum soon as when its ready.
If you want to join development team, please choose the job list below and fill up/post this form:
[QUOTE] What position do you want to be: Why do you want to join: Your MSN:
[CODER ONLY] Your skill: What the best thing you coded:
[HOSTER ONLY] How long can you host:[/QUOTE]
[CENTER][SIZE=5][B]Job List[/B][/SIZE] [B]Server Coder[/B] Whitey (Rune-Server User) Mr Chainsaw (Rune-Server User) moparclient (MoparScape User) - -
[B]Server Tester[/B] moparclient (MoparScape User) - - - -
[B]Hoster[/B] Godsend (Rune-Server User) Rock~Band (Rune-Server User) - - -
[B]IPB forum development[/B] Whitey (Rune-Server User) Jv (Rune-Server User) - - - [/CENTER]
Thank you for reading/joining!
[B]~ Java_Coffee™[/B]

item.dc:creator: @Java_Coffee Java_Coffee™
item.description:
@Java_Coffee wrote:

No thanks, Runescape project.

p0unding, You could work on my custom page in my ipb (php and html is allow). Zeb, alright, we will discuss about it.

Thanks for joining! :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2008, 06:46:14 AM[/size][hr]Comon! We need more peoples! :P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2008, 11:15:33 AM[/size][hr]Comon! WE NEED MORE PEOPLES!!! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2008, 06:03:40 AM[/size][hr]NEED MORE PEOPLE!!

item.title: ¥¯°·.¸.¸.·°¯¥ LiveScape Server Development Team - NEED MORE PEOPLE ¥¯°·.¸.¸.·°¯¥
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

This is… TeH fAiLz

IF you have like 6 spots for staff then you’ll get no-where.

Hoster, 5 spots open? WTH IS THAT GONNA HELP WITH?? You’ll have staff fighting ov er who does what and people saying i’ve just coded this and another person saying ive just coded the same thing but its better. Staff Arguements: Staff quits.

And if you want like 7 ip’s people will be perdy annoyed, because there would be char. whipes all the time. So have fun with this even though it will fail pretty soon.

Read full topic
